scripts.i: concurrently "cd APIs/API_Gateway_Flutter && npm i" "cd APIs/API_Gateway_React && npm i" "cd Microservices/Tournament_Service && npm i" "cd Microservices/User_Service && npm i" "cd Microservices/Game_Service && npm i" "cd Microservices/Community_Service && npm i" "cd Microservices/Media_Service && npm i" "cd Microservices/Chat_Service && npm i" "cd Microservices/Search_Service && npm i" "cd Microservices/Admin_Service && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd APIs/API_Gateway_Flutter && npm start" "cd APIs/API_Gateway_React && npm start" "cd Microservices/Tournament_Service && npm start" "cd Microservices/User_Service && npm start" "cd Microservices/Game_Service && npm start" "cd Microservices/Community_Service && npm start" "cd Microservices/Media_Service && npm start" "cd Microservices/Chat_Service && npm start" "cd Microservices/Search_Service && npm start" "cd Microservices/Admin_Service && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd APIs/API_Gateway_Flutter && npm run dev" "cd APIs/API_Gateway_React && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/Tournament_Service && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/User_Service && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/Game_Service && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/Community_Service && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/Media_Service && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/Chat_Service && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/Search_Service && npm run dev" "cd Microservices/Admin_Service && npm run dev"
